Scheduled intraoperative volume requirement least 15 ml / kg body weight ( BROCA ) gelatine solution Provision voluntary consent participate study , follow full explanation nature purpose study , sign informed consent form approve Institutional Ethics Committee ( IEC ) prior evaluation .
